Classes/ShinyView.html#/s:5Shiny0A4ViewC.name: colors
Classes/ShinyView.html#/s:5Shiny0A4ViewC.abstract: The array of UIColor objects defining the color of each gradient stop.

Classes/ShinyView.html#/s:5Shiny0A4ViewC.name: locations
Classes/ShinyView.html#/s:5Shiny0A4ViewC.abstract: The array of CGFloat objects defining the location of each gradient stop as a value in the range [0,1]. The values must be monotonically increasing. If a nil array is given, the stops are assumed to spread uniformly across the [0,1] range. Defaults to nil.

Classes/ShinyView.html#/s:5Shiny0A4ViewC.name: scale
Classes/ShinyView.html#/s:5Shiny0A4ViewC.abstract: The scale factor of the gradient. Defaults to 2.
